pre_caption: This video is a scenery shot of an architectural rendering. The camera performs a slow aerial fly-over, moving across a foreground of abstract, low-polygon trees. The view proceeds toward a detailed model of two large, modern buildings with glass roofs, which are set within a simplified, all-white city model.
